comments.body:
Two questions related to this:

+ Will this `osx` selector be respected? Sounds like from the documentation it may not be: https://conda.io/docs/user-guide/tasks/build-packages/define-metadata.html#architecture-independent-packages
+ What is the reason for skipping OSX?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +15,19 @@  noarch: generic
  script: npm install -g .
  skip: True  # [osx]

requirements:
